label: DisposalInstructions
comment: A set of instructions detailing how to properly dispose of a material.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code describing recycling in these disposal instructions.
An identifier of the material to which these returnable asset instructions apply.
A recycling procedure, expressed as text, for these disposal instructions.
